sentences.en: “went around talking to people about anything until he could lay his standard question on them”(&b{John Vinocur})
sentences.cn: “他在人群中转来转去，谈天说地，直到他最后向他们提出他的权威性问题”(&b{约翰·维诺克})

sentences.en: As she spoke, she was laying him a place at the table.
